API reference¶

Distributions¶

This section contains statistical functions for various distributions for a wide range of purposes.

General Functions¶

This section includes approximations about the normal distribution, as well as calculations for the poison-binomial distribution.

distributions.dpoibin_exact

The exact probability mass function for the poisson-binomial distribution.

distributions.dpoibin_FT

The probability mass function for the poisson-binomial distribution using Fourier transforms.

distributions.dpoibin_PA

Poisson approximation of the Poisson-Binomial probability mass function.

distributions.dwrap

This function is meant to be similar to the R distribution functions, such as dnorm, pnorm, qnorm, etc.

distributions.pnorm_approx

This is a fast approximation of the normal cdf, accurate to 1.5e-7.

distributions.ppoibin_RNA

Refined normal approximation of Poisson-Binomial Cumulative Distribution.

distributions.qnorm_approx

This is a faster approximation of the normal quantile function (At least this was true at the time I last benchmarked it).

Likelihood Functions¶

These common likelihood functions are presented in two formats, one that is the simple likelihood definition (usable for any data), and one that assumes your data is part of a GLM or similar model.

distributions.exponential_mle

Maximum Likelihood Estimate of an exponential distribution (with an option for right-censoring).

distributions.likelihood_bernoulli

The likelihood for a binary output or bernoulli model.

distributions.likelihood_gaussian

The likelihood for a normal(ish) output or gaussian model.

distributions.likelihood_poisson

The likelihood for a count output or poisson model.

distributions.glm_likelihood_bernoulli

The likelihood for a logistic regression or bernoulli model with a penalty term (can accept any norm, default is 1 for L1).

distributions.glm_likelihood_gaussian

The likelihood for a gaussian regression model with a penalty term (can accept any norm, default is 1 for L1).

distributions.glm_likelihood_poisson

The likelihood for a poisson regression model with a penalty term (can accept any norm, default is 1 for L1).

Posterior Functions¶

These functions are mainly for Bayesian Inference, and for use with the MCMC module.

distributions.exp_gamma

Posterior distribution for an exponential likelihood with a gamma prior.

distributions.NHPP_posterior

The posterior density of the non-homogenous Poisson distribution with a power-law process.

distributions.pois_gamma

Posterior density for the Poisson distribution (assuming gamma prior).

distributions.pois_gamma_ada

Posterior density for the Poisson distribution (assuming gamma prior), learns the gamma shape/scale as part of mcmc.

distributions.pois_uniform

Posterior density for the Poisson distribution (assuming uniform prior).

distributions.posterior_logreg_lasso

The posterior density for a logistic regression model with an L1 penalty term.

distributions.ap_logreg_lasso

The posterior density for a logistic regression model with an L1 penalty term.

distributions.posterior_poisson_lasso

The posterior density for a poisson regression model with an L1 penalty term.

distributions.posterior_poisson_lasso_od

The posterior density for a poisson regression model with an L1 penalty term.

distributions.ap_poisson_lasso_od

The posterior density for a poisson regression model with an L1 penalty term.

distributions.weibull_gamma

The posterior density for a weibull distribution with a gamma prior.

distributions.weibull_regression_post

The posterior density for a weibull regression model with an L1 penalty term.

Estimators¶

Bayesian Estimators¶

Bayesian Estimators using MCMC to calculate model parameters and associated errors.

estimators.BayesLogRegClassifier

A Logistic Regression Classifier that uses MCMC to evaluate the parameters.

estimators.BayesPoissonRegressor

A Poisson Regressor that uses MCMC to evaluate the parameters.

estimators.BayesWeibullRegressor

A Weibull Regressor that uses MCMC to evaluate the parameters.

Feature Selection¶

Value Drop Procedures¶

feature_selection.getHighCorrs

Given a correlation matrix, return the correlations that are above the threshold.

feature_selection.dropCorrProcedure

Calculates the inter-correlation of the columns in a matrix/dataframe, and then drops columns that are above a given threshold.

feature_selection.dropHighCorrs

Remove high inter-correlations from the dataset.

feature_selection.naiveScoreDrop

Drop columns based on which columns have scores below the threshold.

feature_selection.naiveVarDrop

Drop columns based on which columns have variance below the threshold.

feature_selection.vifDrop

Selection Algorithms¶

feature_selection.forwardSelection

A forward selection algorithm for classification only right now.

Feature Importance¶

feature_selection.permutation_importance

Performs permutation importance on a fitted model.

feature_selection.permutation_importance_CV

Performs a cross-validated permutation importance on a non-fitted model.

MCMC¶

MCMC Object¶

mcmc.mcmcObject

An object to hold MCMC chains, and to store/compute useful metrics on them.

MCMC Supporting Functions¶

mcmc.applyMCMC

This function iteratively applies the MCMC initialization.

mcmc.cholupdate

Upper triangle, rank one update for cholesky decomposed matrix.

MCMC Diagnostics¶

mcmc.minESS

Translated from the R mcmcse package.

mcmc.multiESS

This function computes the Effective Sample Size of an MCMC chain.

mcmc.raftery

Calculate the Raftery diagnostic to determine how many more samples are needed.

mcmc.samp_size_calc_raftery

Calculate needed sample size for Raftery evaluation.

MCMC Algorithms¶

mcmc.adaptive_mcmc

A random walk metropolis algorithm that adaptively tunes the covariance matrix.

mcmc.rwm

A random walk metropolis algorithm.

mcmc.rwm_with_lap

A random walk metropolis algorithm that adaptively tunes the covariance matrix with a log-adaptive posterior.

Modeling¶

Modeling Tools¶

modeling.beta_trans

Transform the model coefficients in a logistic regression model.

modeling.bPCA

An algorithm to compute missing values using Bayesian PCA.

modeling.crossVal

A custom cross-validation strategy.

modeling.EstimatorSelectionHelper

A wrapper for easily grid-searching multiple models in the same run.

modeling.getPriors

Calculate the class distributions across each column of the dataset.

modeling.prettyConfMat

Print a pretty confusion matrix.

modeling.printScores

A helper function to print the outputs of the crossVal function.

modeling.RegressionSE

Since sklearn doesn’t generate the standard errors by default…

modeling.runScorers

Performs the cross-validation.

modeling.scoreModel

Score a model using the given metrics.

modeling.vif

Calculate Variance Inflation Factors.

Neural Networks¶

Activations¶

nn.activations.create_jac_mask

nn.activations.cross_entropy

Binary Cross Entropy.

nn.activations.cross_entropy_binary

Binary Cross Entropy.

nn.activations.cross_entropy_binary_der

The derivative of binary cross-entropy.

nn.activations.cross_entropy_der

The derivative of binary cross-entropy.

nn.activations.elu

Exponential Linear Unit.

nn.activations.elu_der

Exponential Linear Unit derivative.

nn.activations.gelu

nn.activations.gelu_approx

nn.activations.gelu_der

nn.activations.gelu_speedy

nn.activations.gelu_speedy_der

nn.activations.linear

nn.activations.linear_der

nn.activations.mse

nn.activations.mse_der

nn.activations.mse_linear_der

nn.activations.relu

Rectified Linear Unit.

nn.activations.relu_der

Rectified Linear Unit Derivative.

nn.activations.selu

nn.activations.selu_der

nn.activations.sigmoid

nn.activations.sigmoid_cross_entropy_binary_der

nn.activations.sigmoid_der

nn.activations.sigmoid_scale

nn.activations.sigmoid_scale_der

nn.activations.softmax

nn.activations.softmax_cross_entropy_der

nn.activations.softmax_cross_entropy_der_fullmath

nn.activations.softmax_der

nn.activations.softmax_oneout

Initializers¶

nn.initializers.he_normal

He normal initialization.

nn.initializers.he_uniform

He uniform initialization.

nn.initializers.lecun_uniform

Lecun uniform initialization.

nn.initializers.lecun_normal

Lecun normal initialization.

nn.initializers.random_normal

Random initialization.

nn.initializers.xavier_normal

Xavier normal initialization.

nn.initializers.xavier_uniform

Xavier uniform initialization.

nn.initializers.lecun_uniform

Lecun uniform initialization.

nn.initializers.lecun_normal

Lecun normal initialization.

Model¶

nn.model.NeuralNetwork

The base class for custom neural networks in numpy

Optimizers¶

nn.optimizers.adam

The Adam optimizer.

nn.optimizers.gradient_descent

The simple gradient descent update.
